tool_description: Camera bodies from several brands since 1996! We also have interchangable lenses. Old and new, all there.
name: Camera Database
title: Camera Database

api_list.name: /lenses

optional_parameters.name: focal_length
optional_parameters.description: Focal length. If it's a variable aperture, e.g. 18-50, 18 or 50 would both match.

optional_parameters.name: maximum_aperture
optional_parameters.description: Maximum Aperture.

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: Page size, default is 10. Max is 100.

optional_parameters.name: aperture_ring
optional_parameters.description: Indicates whether the lens has an aperture ring.

optional_parameters.name: filter_thread
optional_parameters.description: Filter thread in mm.

optional_parameters.name: groups
optional_parameters.description: Amount of groups.

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: Brand of the camera

optional_parameters.name: autofocus
optional_parameters.description: Indicates whether the lens has autofocus.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page to be querried. Default is the first page.

optional_parameters.name: minimum_aperture
optional_parameters.description: Minimum aperture.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of the lens. Case insensitive and wild match.

optional_parameters.name: elements
optional_parameters.description: Number of elements in a lens

api_list.name: /cameras

optional_parameters.name: megapixels
optional_parameters.description: Effective megapixels of the camera

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: Page size, default is 10. Max is 100.

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: Brand of the camera

optional_parameters.name: sensor_size
optional_parameters.description: Sensor size.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of the camera. Case insensitive.

optional_parameters.name: announced
optional_parameters.description: Announced year. The database has cameras from 1996.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page to be querried. Default is the first page.

optional_parameters.name: lens_mount
optional_parameters.description: Lens mount, or brand.
